description: Set to 'true' to install the file storage driver.
name: install-local-storage-file

description: Set to 'true' if you want to automatically discover and use the volumes on your worker nodes for file storage.
displayname: Automatic volume discovery for file storage
name: auto-discover-devices-file

description: The 'key' of the worker node 'key=value' label that you want to use for file storage.
displayname: File storage worker node label key
name: file-nodes-label-key

description: The 'value' of the worker node 'key=value' label that you want to use for file storage.
displayname: File storage worker node label value
name: file-nodes-label-value

description: The path to the storage devices on your worker node that you want to use for file storage. Example: '/dev/sdc'. This option is required when 'auto-discover-devices-file' is set to 'false'.
name: file-devicepath

description: The file system type. Specify 'ext3', 'ext4', or 'xfs'.
name: fstype

description: Set to 'true' to install the block storage driver.
name: install-local-storage-block

description: Set to 'true' if you want to automatically discover and use the volumes on your worker nodes for block storage.
displayname: Automatic volume discovery for block storage
name: auto-discover-devices-block

description: The 'key' of the worker node 'key=value' label that you want to use for block storage.
displayname: Block storage worker node label key
name: block-nodes-label-key

description: The 'value' of the worker node 'key=value' label that you want to use for block storage.
displayname: Block storage worker node label value
name: block-nodes-label-value

description: The path to the storage devices on your worker node that you want to use for block storage. Example: '/dev/sdc'. This option is required when 'auto-discover-devices-block' is set to false.
displayname: Device Path for Local Storage Block
name: block-devicepath
